subject: Tennis
Swiss Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams was routed, 6-0, 6-2, by Halep at the WTA Finals in one of the most one-sided losses of Williams’s career.
snippet: Serena Williams was routed, 6-0, 6-2, by Halep at the WTA Finals in one of the most one-sided losses of Williams’s career.
